descriptionSet.description: A poster/advertisement of 1979 released Hindi film, "Do Ladke Dono Kadke" showing the main actors, Amol Palekar and Asrani carrying liquor bottles and passing mischievous looks. The upper section of the advertisement shows a close up of the female protagonist, Moushumi Chatterjee. The title translates to "Two Boys and both are poppers"

inscription.text: Romu N. Sippy presents Basu Chatterjee's Do Ladke Dono Kadke starring

Moushumi, Amol Palekar, Asrani, Ranjeet, Iftikhar, Prema Narayan, Dina Pathak, Viju Khote, Mona, Nirmal Kumar, Vinay Sibbal, Niloo Phile, Sawan Varma, Manik Chowdhury, Rajat Kumar, Amal Sen, Pardesi, Harish Chandra, Master Ravi, R.S. Chopra, Ritu Kamal & Keshto Mukherje, Coca Cola Special Appearance: Navin Nischol, Mithu Mukherjee

Produced by Jayanta Mukherjee Screenplay, Dialogue, Direction Basu Chatterjee Cinematography K.K. Mahajan Audiography Narinder Singh Music Hemant Kumar Editing V.N. Mayekar Story Robi Ghosh Lyrics Yogesh Costumes M.R. Bhutkar Make Up Shyam Khandekar Publicity Officers V.P. SAthe & Colin Pal Processed at Ramnord Research Lab. Ltd.
